title: User Interface
purpose: Offer a simple, streamlined web or desktop interface for interaction.
functional_requirements: Allow file uploads, display summaries, manage topics, and show citations.
Provide interactive quizzes or feedback mechanisms.
Maintain user context (e.g., progress, known topics, personal library).
